This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the [[Boss Update]] ({{BE}} 0.16.x releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Friendly Update]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 0.15.x releases).

==Mobs==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
|[[Guardian]]
|[[File:Guardian Revision 1.png|128px]]
|Naturally generated in underwater temples.
|
Guardians always drop when dying:
{{Drop|item|Prismarine Shard|0|2}}
Guardians have a chance to drop additional items:
{{Drop|item|Raw Fish|0|2}}
{{Drop|item|Prismarine Crystals|0|2}}
In addition, the guardian has a 2.5% chance of dropping an additional fish.
|
* Attacks [[squid]] and players with a beam.
* When on land it flops around but remains hostile.
* The player will also get damaged with a thorns-like effect if it damages the guardian while their spikes are deployed (as if it's being prickled).
|-
|[[Elder guardian]]
|[[File:Elder Guardian Revision 1.png|128px]]
|Naturally generated in underwater temples.
|
Elder Guardians always drop when dying:
{{Drop|item|Prismarine Shard|0|2}}
{{Drop|block|Wet Sponge|1}}
Elder Guardians have a chance to drop additional items:
{{Drop|item|Raw Fish|0|2}}
{{Drop|item|Prismarine Crystals|0|2}}
In addition, the Elder Guardian has a 2.5% chance of dropping an additional fish.
|
* Is recognized as a Boss creature.
* Only 3 will be generated for each underwater temple.
* Will give nearby players the [[Mining Fatigue]] III effect.
|-
|[[Wither]]
|[[File:Wither JE1 BE1.png|128px]]
|Place 4 [[soul sand]] in a T shape and place 3 [[wither skeleton skull]]s on top of it to create it (pictured below).
|
{{Drop|item|Nether Star|1}}
|
* New boss creature.
* Spawns 3-4 [[wither skeleton]]s when health drops to 50%.
** Does not spawn on Easy difficulty.
* Has new animations when crafting and being killed.
* New sounds.
|}
